transcript.text: *tramway noise*
Day 1
Program
Hello and welcome to this 3rd video in Japan!
We are in Tokyo...
and more specifically in Akihabara
Remember: that's the geek area where I visited a sex-shop with Cyprien (famous french YouTuber)
There are too many holes in this thing...
*both laughing*
We're not going to start with the sex-shop but we're going to an arcade room
There's one just over there, what a coincidence
What a good YouTuber I am
Are you excited to be in this place?
Pretty much, yeah
So, with my brother we want to fight on Tekken
Our childhood game
I took Bob, he took Bryan
"I want to master Bryan"
We don't care about what you're saying Florent
What matters is that you loose
